Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.29551999] Gram-negative bacteria:E. faecalis-sensitive strain (MIC=25.6 μM),Staphylococcus aureus-sensitive strain (MIC=34.9 μM),,Staphylococcus aureus-resistant strain (MIC=25.0 μM);Gram-positive bacteria:Klebsiella pneumoniaae-sensitive strain (MIC=30.7 μM),Klebsiella pneumoniaae-resistant strain (MIC=26.2 μM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa-sensitive strain (MIC=99.7 μM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa-resistant strain (MIC=107.2 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.29551999] 24.8% hemolysis at 100μM,50% hemolysis at >100μM against human red cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria

Literature.Title: Design, Synthesis and Evaluation of Branched RRWQWR-Based Peptides as Antibacterial Agents against Clinically Relevant Gram-Positive and Gram-Negative Pathogens
Literature.Author: Vega SC, Mart
